Itâ€™s so easy to make at home rather than store bought ones, I hope you could try this special spice powder will soon share rice recipe ( Bisi Bele Bath Recipe ğŸ˜ƒ) Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Quantity : 6 Tb spÂ  Ingredients:
  • Chana dal/ Bengal gram - 2 Tb sp
  • Urad dal / Skinless Black Gram - 2 Tb sp
  • Dry Red chillies (Kashmiri ) - 10
  • Coriander seeds - 1 Tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 Tb sp
  • Poppy seeds - 1 Tb sp
  • Dry coconut powder/ desiccated coconut powder Â - 1 1/2 Tb sp
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Cloves - 3
  • Cinnamon - 2 inch stick ( break into pieces )
Procedure:
  • Heat a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add Chana dal & urad dal, dry roast them till they turn aromatic or turns light brown color
  • Take out onto a plate, then add cumin seeds, coriander seeds, Kashmiri dry Red chillies, cloves and cinnamon pieces
  • Dry roast them till they turn aromatic and transfer them in plate
  • Next add poppy seeds, desiccated coconut powder till they turn light golden brown ( fry these over low to medium heat)
  • Take out them in a plate and let them become cool down
  • Finally, add them in mixer grinder along with red chilly powder and make fine powder
